Member Function Documentation

attachBehavior ( $  name,
$  behavior 
)

Attaches an Behavior to this component. We just cache the names here for lookup speed.

Parameters:
string the Behavior's name. It should uniquely identify this Behavior.
mixed the Behavior configuration. This is passed as the first parameter to YiiBase::createComponent to create the Behavior object.
Returns:
IPSBehavior the Behavior object

Definition at line 229 of file CPSWidget.php.

    {
        //  Attach the Behavior at the parent and add options here...
        if ( $_behavior = parent::attachBehavior( $name, $behavior ) )
        {
            //  Add to our cache...
            $this->_behaviorCache[] = $name;
        }

        return $_behavior;
    }

static create ( $  name = null,
array $  options = array() 
) [static]

Constructs and returns a widget

The options passed in are dynamically added to the options array and will be accessible and modifiable as normal (.i.e. $this->theme, $this->baseUrl, etc.)

Parameters:
string $name The type of widget to create
array $options The options for the widget
Returns:
CPSWidget

Reimplemented in CPSCKEditorWidget, CPSEnhanceJSTree, CPSjqAchtung, CPSjqMaskedInputWrapper, CPSjqSelectMenu, CPSjqToolsWrapper, CPSjQueryWidget, CPSjqValidate, CPSMarkItUpWidget, CPSMcDropdownWidget, CPSWysiwygWidget, CPSfgMenu, CPSjqGridWidget, CPSjqUIAlerts, and CPSjqUIWrapper.

Definition at line 312 of file CPSWidget.php.

    {
        //  Allow shifted arguments...
        if ( is_array( $name ) && array() === $options )
        {
            $options = $name;
            $name = null;
        }

        //  Instantiate...
        $_name = CPSHelperBase::nvl( $name, ( is_callable( 'get_called_class' ) ? get_called_class() : $name ) );
        $_class = CPSHelperBase::o( $options, 'class', ( is_callable( 'get_called_class' ) ? get_called_class() : $_name ), true );
        $_widget = new $_class();
        $_widget->widgetName = $_name;
        $_widget->id = $_widget->name = CPSHelperBase::o( $options, 'id', $_name );
        $_widget->name = CPSHelperBase::o( $options, 'name', $_widget->id );

        //  Push any optional scripts
        foreach ( CPSHelperBase::o( $options, '_scripts', array(), true ) as $_script )
            $_widget->pushScriptFile( $_widget->baseUrl . $_script );

        //  And CSS
        foreach ( CPSHelperBase::o( $options, '_cssFiles', array(), true ) as $_css )
            $_widget->pushCssFile( $_widget->baseUrl . $_css );

        //  Now process the rest of the options...
        $_widget->addOptions( $options );

        //  Initialize our widget
        $_widget->init();

        //  And run it...
        if ( $_widget->autoRun )
            $_widget->run();

        //  And return...
        return $_widget;
    }

init (  ) 

Initialize our component.

Reimplemented in CPSjqToolsWrapper, CPSjQueryWidget, CPSPortlet, CPSThemeRoller, CPSfgMenu, and CPSjqUIWrapper.

Definition at line 101 of file CPSWidget.php.

    {
        if ( ! $this->_initialized )
        {
            //  Now call parent's init...
            parent::init();

            //  Call our behaviors init() method if they exist
            foreach ( $this->_behaviorCache as $_name )
                $this->asa( $_name )->init();

            //  Get the id/name of this widget
            list( $this->name, $this->id ) = $this->resolveNameID();

            if ( empty( $this->name ) )
                $this->name = $this->_internalName;

            //  We are now...
            $this->_initialized = true;
        }
    }

registerClientScripts (  ) 

Reimplemented in CPSFacebookConnect, CPSgApiWidget, and CPSjqRatingWidget.

Definition at line 181 of file CPSWidget.php.

    {
        //  Register a special CSS file if we have one...
        if ( $this->cssFile )
        {
            $this->pushCssFile( $this->cssFile );
            $this->cssFile = null;
        }

        $_baseUrl = CPSHelperBase::_gbu();

        //  Load css files and unset from array...
        while ( null !== ( $_file = $this->popCssFile() ) )
        {
CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'Popped css: ' . print_r($_file,true) );
            CPSHelperBase::_rcf( $_baseUrl . $_file['path'], $_file['media'] );
        }

        //  Load script files and unset from array...
        while ( null !== ( $_file = $this->popScriptFile() ) )
        {
CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'Popped script: ' . print_r($_file,true) );
            CPSHelperBase::_rsf( $_baseUrl . $_file['path'], $_file['position'] );
        }

        //  Send upstream for convenience
        return CPSHelperBase::_cs();
    }

registerWidgetScript ( $  script = null,
$  position = CClientScript::POS_READY 
)

Registers a widget script. If no script is provided, the object's generateJavascript() method is called to get the sript.

Parameters:
string $script
integer Where to load the script. See CClientScript for values.
